result.eng: You might want to improve the design.
result.ga: b'fhiú dhuit feabhas a chur ar an dearadh
result.orig: b'fhiú dhuit feabhas a chur ar an dearadh
result.html: b'fhiú dhuit feabhas a chur ar an dearadhYou might want to improve the design.
result.ponchtml: b'ḟiú ḋuit feaḃas a ċur ar an dearaḋYou might want to improve the design.

result.eng: Although he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.
result.ga: tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid gearmáinise
result.orig: tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid gearmáinise
result.html: tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid gearmáiniseAlthough he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.
result.ponchtml: tar éis go raiḃ sé ina ċónaí sa ġearmáin le ḋá ḃliain níor ṫáinig feaḃas ar biṫ ar a ċuid gearmáiniseAlthough he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.
